price: They said, “Have you come to us with the truth, or are you joking?”
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ أَجِئۡتَنَا بِٱلۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّٰعِبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
